00022 // --- matrix operations ---------------
00023 // --- D = inv(D) ------
00024 bool calcDinv(int n, double *D, int ldd);
00025 bool calcDinv_Opt(int n, double *D, int ldd);
00026 void OutputMat(int n, double *D, int ldd);
00027 // --- B = B*D ---
00028 void calcBD(int n, int m, double *B, int ldb, 
00029             const double *D, int ldd, double *rwork, int lrwork);
00030 // --- B = D*B ---
00031 inline void calcDB(int n, int m, const double *D, int ldd, 
00032             double *B, int ldb, double *rwork, int lrwork)
00033 {
00034         assert(lrwork>=n*m);
00035         int i, j, l;
00036   
00037         // --- calculate D*B, and store result in rwork ---
00038         for(j=0; j<m; j++) {
00039                 for(i=0; i<n; i++) rwork[i+j*n] = 0.0;
00040                         
00041                 for(l=0; l<n; l++) 
00042                         for(i=0; i<n; i++) rwork[i+j*n] += B[l+j*ldb]*D[i+l*ldd];
00043         }              
00044 
00045         // --- copy result from rwork to B ---
00046         for(j=0; j<m; j++) 
00047                 for(i=0; i<n; i++) 
00048                         B[i+j*ldb] = rwork[i+j*n];
00049 }
00050 
00051 // --- calculate A-B*C, and store result in A --- 
00052 void calcA_BC(int n, int m, int k, double *A, int lda, 
00053               const double *B, int ldb, const double *C, int ldc);
00054 
00055 // --- A = B*C ---
00056 // --- A = B*C, A(n,m), B(n, k), C(k, m) -----------------
00057 inline void calcAequBC(int n, int m, int k, double *A, int lda, 
00058               const double *B, int ldb, const double *C, int ldc)
00059 {
00060         int i, j, l;
00061   
00062         // --- calculate A = B*C, 
00063         for(j=0; j<m; j++) 
00064         {
00065                 for(i=0; i<n; i++) 
00066                 {
00067                         A[i+j*lda] = C[j*ldc]*B[i];
00068                         for(l=1; l<k; l++) 
00069                                 A[i+j*lda] += C[l+j*ldc]*B[i+l*ldb];
00070                 }
00071         }              
00072 }
00073

00075 void calcBD2(int n, int m1, int m2, double *B1, double *B2, int ldb, 
00076             const double *D, int ldd, double *rwork, int lrwork);
